text: hello this bill Cunningham from New York
and summer is approaching like a tornado
as a matter of fact I saw a young woman
she looked like a tornado a
multi-colored one I think I counted 45
or 46 hula hoops all at one time as she
spin it if it I couldn't believe I was
just a typical day in New York on
Wednesday night at the Brooklyn
Botanical Gardens they have a family
night and there they were reviving the
hula hoop for the kiddies so a whole new
generation is spinning into summer it's
just wonderful
lost sanity when five thousand
spectators were boarding boats to
Liberty Island in to attend the Vere
Clicquot Polo Classic match and they
were wearing undecorated huge almost
hula hoop size straw hats sunshade hats
the whole idea I had seen them about ten
years ago they were wearing hats that
resembled a Scot in England well they
asked God had has disappeared and just a
great big hula hoop circle of straw an
old-fashioned had to keep the Sun off
you it was great and it was a wonderful
preview I thought of a summer with lunch
and special occasions the young people
in young women long dresses short
dresses shorts replacing trousers not a
surprise to summer but the wonderful
surprise when there's something
happening in menswear young men who
would have appeared in other times in
t-shirts and jeans forget it they were
in really I would say Hollywood 30s 40
sartorial splendor summer seats it was
really a wonderful preview all this week
of what I think is going to come when
summer arrives on June 21st
Oh
